name: Stay In The Box
description:
Stay in the box. Just stay in it. Everything will be OK as long as you just STAY IN THE BOX.

Look at all the nice things that are in the box: happiness, wonder, kittens, television, needles, teeth - wait, not those last two. I think?

Arrow keys or WASD to move, space to not move (but there's a cooldown...)

A "game" "by" Josh Addison
@monkeyfluids

(Not gonna lie: the HTML5 version is a bit ropey in some browsers - better to download the installer if you can.)
